Name: Sniper Fodder
About the game: Inspired by the classic Amiga 500, you take on the role of a sniper, eliminating all the enemies without showing you. 10 fantastic levels of stealth and military strategy. Harness the surrounding environment and free the area from enemies, facilitating the allied troops key features: * eliminates all enemies * square anti-tank mines * aims at armored tanks * do not let you see 'hide' * exploits the surrounding environment
